alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 9:58PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A line of rain, mixing with snow will impact portions of Lackawanna, southern Wayne, Luzerne, western Pike and eastern Wyoming Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 957 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported strong wind gusts along a line extending from Factoryville to Woodside-Drifton. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains and Carbondale. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 202. Interstate 84 between 1 and 34. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH

area.areaDesc: Lackawanna; Luzerne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming
